amendment.description: Page 5, line 23, strike "to contribute to" and all that follows through "by Iran;" on page 5, line 25 and insert the following: "to contribute--" (A) to the continued development, testing, and procurement of ballistic missile technology by Iran; and (B) to human rights abuses.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part A of House Report 115-463 to amend the reporting requirement on recommendations for how U.S. economic sanctions against Iran may be revised to prevent funds or assets from being used to contribute to the continued development of Iran's ballistic missile program to also include human rights abuses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schneider amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Schneider.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Schneider amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
